trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZA010_03352_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The unfulfilled forager has a craving for meat.
TEXT_LUCKZA010_03352_TODO_00<tab>Use the wrangling rope on a weakened tragopan.
TEXT_LUCKZA010_03352_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the trussed-up tragopan to the unfulfilled forager.
TEXT_LUCKZA010_03352_GRIMYMAN03352_000_000<tab>Ah, what I wouldn't give for just one mouthful of juicy meat...
TEXT_LUCKZA010_03352_GRIMYMAN03352_000_001<tab>I've eaten naught but meol for more moons than I can count! I mean, I'm grateful for the handouts and all but sometimes a man needs variety.
TEXT_LUCKZA010_03352_GRIMYMAN03352_000_002<tab>Aye, if I had me a roasted game bird about now, I'd strip that beauty down to the bone!
TEXT_LUCKZA010_03352_GRIMYMAN03352_000_003<tab>But have you ever tried catchin' one of them tragopans? It's like askin' to have your eyes pecked out. ...What, you reckon you could do better?
TEXT_LUCKZA010_03352_GRIMYMAN03352_000_004<tab>Go ahead, then─make me eat my own words. Just so long as they come with a side dish of bird flesh!

TEXT_LUCKZA010_03352_GRIMYMAN03352_000_005<tab>And make sure you bring it back alive and kickin', you understand? Here's a rope to truss it up, and a sack to carry it. You might need to, uh, daze it a bit first...
TEXT_LUCKZA010_03352_GRIMYMAN03352_000_006<tab>Once you've knocked the fight out of the bird, you can bind it with that length of rope!
TEXT_LUCKZA010_03352_GRIMYMAN03352_000_010<tab>Tell me there's a bird in that sack!
TEXT_LUCKZA010_03352_GRIMYMAN03352_000_011<tab>Oof, that's a feisty one! Nice work, stranger!
TEXT_LUCKZA010_03352_GRIMYMAN03352_000_012<tab>Ah, seein' this fellow all trussed up for the dinner table reminds me of bein' back in Stilltide...
TEXT_LUCKZA010_03352_GRIMYMAN03352_000_013<tab>It's been years since I left to chase after Eulmore's promises, but I'm no closer to gettin' through that gate than when I started.
TEXT_LUCKZA010_03352_GRIMYMAN03352_000_014<tab>It's been years since I left to chase after Eulmore's promises─I suppose I've just gotten too used to the life here in Gatetown.
TEXT_LUCKZA010_03352_GRIMYMAN03352_000_015<tab>Maybe it's time I gave up on hollow dreams and went home to my old mum... Anyway, my thanks for the bird, friend!
